dcterms:creator: Jonathan Berant
Andrew Chou
Roy Frostig
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 3,778 training instances and 2,032 test instances. Questions were collected by querying the Google Suggest API, and answers were crowd-sourced using Freebase as the backend knowledge base.
dcterms:title: WEBQUESTIONS

dcterms:creator: Y. Su
H. Sun
B. Sadler
M. Srivatsa
I. Gur
Z. Yan
X. Yan
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 5,166 question-answer pairs, evenly split into a training and a test set. It was created by asking crowd workers to paraphrase 500 Freebase graph queries in natural language.
dcterms:title: GRAPHQUESTIONS

dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
W.-t. Yih
C. Meek
dcterms:description: This dataset has 3,047 questions sampled from Bing query logs. The questions are associated with 29,258 candidate answer sentences, 1,473 of which contain the correct answers to the questions.
dcterms:title: WIKIQA
